events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the software engineering department for further screening.
A recruiter specializing in tech roles has been assigned to manage your application and next steps.
The initial screening call was completed successfully, and your experience aligns well with the role.
Thank you for your prompt response and interest in proceeding with the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 8th at 2 PM via video conference.
You have successfully completed the technical interview with positive feedback from the engineering panel.
Your HR interview is confirmed for May 12th at 11 AM to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and you have addressed all questions about the role and company policies.
We are excited to extend an official offer for the software engineer position. Please review the details.
Thank you for providing your feedback. We are glad you are enthusiastic about joining our engineering team.
Congratulations on accepting the offer. We look forward to your start and onboarding process.
Your onboarding has officially started. Welcome to the team! We will guide you through the setup and orientation.
The hiring process is now complete. We are excited to have you on board as part of our engineering department.
